whySwissVault.title: Why Swiss BrAIn?
whySwissVault.subtitle: Discretion-first AI for individuals and companies who cannot afford exposure.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge by Design
zeroKnowledge.description: We can't read your encrypted conversations – and neither can anyone else.
zeroKnowledge.details: Client-side AES-256-GCM, per-conversation keys, and strict row-level security.

swissResidency.title: Swiss Data Residency & Governance
swissResidency.description: All data is stored in Swiss data centres with full audit trails and access controls.
swissResidency.details: GDPR-ready today, SOC 2 / ISO 27001 / FINMA on the roadmap.

fullLifecycle.title: Full AI Lifecycle in One Secure Platform
fullLifecycle.description: Ingest, fine-tune, evaluate and deploy assistants – using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, or sovereign open-source models on Swiss GPUs.

solutions.title: Built for Regulated Workflows
solutions.subtitle: Swiss BrAIn is used to power internal assistants where privacy and explainability matter more than raw experimentation.

compliance.title: Compliance & Policy Assistants
compliance.description: Centralise internal policies, procedures and regulations.
compliance.feature1: Let employees ask questions in natural language with full audit logs
compliance.feature2: Enforce zero-retention and strict model policies

developer.title: Secure Developer & Ops Co-Pilots
developer.description: Connect to private GitHub repos, run code-aware models in a zero-trust environment.
developer.feature1: Keep source code and credentials out of third-party logs

banking.title: Knowledge Co-Pilots for Banking & Insurance
banking.description: Ingest product docs, KYC files, and internal wikis.
banking.feature1: Provide frontline teams with instant, traceable answers

howItWorks.title: From Raw Data to Governed AI Assistants
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple four-step process to deploy secure, auditable AI.

step1.title: Connect & Ingest Data Securely
step1.description: Upload docs or connect Slack, Notion, GitHub, Gmail. All data stored in Swiss data centres with row-level access control.

step2.title: Fine-Tune & Evaluate Models
step2.description: Use ready-made templates or your own datasets. Train LoRA/QLoRA adapters on open-source models or use commercial APIs. Evaluate with LLM-as-judge and custom metrics before going live.

step3.title: Deploy Assistants in Vault Chat & via API
step3.description: Spin up encrypted assistants for each team or use Swiss BrAIn's OpenAI-compatible API in your own apps. Enforce per-org model and retention policies.

step4.title: Monitor, Audit & Improve
step4.description: Track usage, quality, and costs in real-time. Export logs for audits. Iterate on datasets, fine-tunes and guardrails.

security.title: Security Architecture Designed for Auditors
security.subtitle: Enterprise-grade security that satisfies the most demanding compliance requirements.

e2e.title: Client-Side End-to-End Encryption
e2e.point1: AES-256-GCM, per-conversation keys, PBKDF2-derived master keys
e2e.point2: Keys never leave the browser; servers see only ciphertext

zeroTrust.title: Zero-Trust Backend
zeroTrust.point2: Immutable audit logs with full before/after change history

swissResidency.title: Swiss Data Residency
swissResidency.point1: All data stored in Switzerland hosted databases
swissResidency.point2: Optional zero-retention mode for inference traces and evaluation samples

complianceRoadmap.title: Compliance Roadmap
complianceRoadmap.point2: SOC 2 Type II (in progress), ISO 27001 and FINMA readiness on the roadmap

browser.title: Your Browser (Keys Here)
browser.description: AES-256-GCM encryption keys stored in IndexedDB. All encryption/decryption happens client-side.

backend.title: Swiss BrAIn Backend
backend.description: Stores only encrypted ciphertext + key hashes. RLS policies enforce data isolation.

models.title: Use the Best Models – Without Losing Privacy
models.subtitle: Swiss BrAIn abstracts away providers so you can choose the right model for each workload while keeping governance and logging in one place, or be completely anonymous with Ghost Chat.

hybridCloud.title: Hybrid Cloud
hybridCloud.description: Centralised routing, billing and monitoring, anonymous and encrypted options.

sovereignOpenSource.title: Sovereign Open-Source
sovereignOpenSource.description: Option to restrict an organisation to Swiss-hosted open-source models only.

cta.title: Ready to Fine-Tune with

cta.noCard: Limited spots available • Be first in line

hero.title: The Complete AI Lifecycle,
hero.description: From raw data to production deployment - build, train, evaluate, and deploy AI models with end-to-end encryption and Swiss data residency at every step.

datasets.title: Datasets
datasets.subtitle: Encrypted, Clean, and Production-Ready
datasets.description: Prepare fine-tuning-ready datasets with precision tools for privacy-first environments. Every step is fully auditable and protected by end-to-end encryption.

features.extract: Extract structured datasets from unstructured files and conversations
features.clean: Clean, deduplicate, and enrich with built-in transformers
features.version: Version, snapshot, and manage datasets securely across teams
features.encryption: Client-side encryption ensures no raw data ever leaves your perimeter

finetuning.title: Fine-Tuning
finetuning.subtitle: Precision-Tuned Models, Privately Trained
finetuning.description: Train language models tailored to your domain - without compromising sovereignty. We select and optimize base models for you, applying state-of-the-art adaptation techniques securely.

features.methods: QLoRA, LoRA, and full fine-tuning on 40+ open models
features.models: Supports BYO base models or Swiss-hosted open weights
features.alignment: Enforce alignment via DPO, GRPO, or your custom reward systems
features.security: Training data remains encrypted end-to-end throughout the process

evaluations.title: Evaluations
evaluations.subtitle: Governed, Transparent, and Customizable
evaluations.description: Measure model performance with verifiable, reproducible, and explainable evaluations - even on encrypted deployments.

features.judges: LLM-as-Judge evaluators (Claude, GPT, etc.) + classical metrics
features.compare: Compare fine-tuned models vs. base + commercial APIs (Claude, GPT-4o)
features.byoe: Bring your own evaluator or connect any endpoint securely
features.compliance: Evaluate in zero-retention mode, preserving full compliance

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.subtitle: Fully Isolated, Instantly Scalable
deployment.description: Deploy fine-tuned models via a sovereign Swiss inference fabric, or run models entirely within your own stack - no tradeoffs on performance or privacy.

features.gpu: Dedicated GPU endpoints with full isolation
features.onprem: Deploy inside your VPC, air-gapped data center, or on-prem
features.inference: Inference encrypted with client-held keys, not stored or logged

cta.title: Ready to Build Sovereign AI?
cta.description: Join organizations building AI on their most sensitive data - with full control, full encryption, and zero compromises.

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.postmanInstructions: Open Postman → Import → Upload the downloaded JSON file
apiDocs.sdkInstructions: Paste the OpenAPI spec in Swagger Editor → Generate Client → Python/TypeScript
apiDocs.name: Name

endpoints.listApiKeysDesc: Retrieve all API keys associated with your account. API keys are used to authenticate requests to the SwissVault.ai API.
endpoints.createChatCompletionDesc: Generate a chat completion using OpenAI-compatible format. Supports base models (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini) and your fine-tuned models.
endpoints.createFinetuningJobDesc: Create a new fine-tuning job. The job will be queued for training once created.
endpoints.listFinetuningJobsDesc: Retrieve all fine-tuning jobs for your account.
endpoints.startTrainingDesc: Start training for a pending fine-tuning job. This initiates the GPU training process.
endpoints.uploadDatasetDesc: Upload a JSONL dataset file to storage. Each line should be a JSON object with a "messages" array.
endpoints.listDatasetsDesc: Retrieve all datasets for your account.
endpoints.createSnapshotDesc: Create a versioned snapshot of a dataset for use in fine-tuning or evaluation.
endpoints.createEvaluationDesc: Create an evaluation to test a model against a dataset using specified metrics.
endpoints.runEvaluationDesc: Start running an evaluation. This processes the dataset and scores with selected metrics.
endpoints.getResultsDesc: Retrieve evaluation results including per-metric scores and detailed per-sample results.
endpoints.listModelsDesc: Retrieve all fine-tuned models for your account.
endpoints.deleteModelDesc: Delete a fine-tuned model. This also removes the model checkpoint from storage.

bitcoin.title: Bitcoin Tumbles Below $88,000 Amid Year-End Selloff
bitcoin.summary: Bitcoin is trading at $87,775, down 0.04%, well below its October high. Hawkish Bank of Japan comments triggered a sharp selloff with digital asset treasury stocks leading the decline.

oil.title: Crude Oil Plunges 2.76% on Oversupply Concerns
oil.summary: Oil prices dropped to $56.74, marking the lowest level since May and heading for the biggest annual decline in seven years as OPEC+ members ramped up production.

corporate.title: Corporate Bitcoin Holdings Face Liquidity Pressure
corporate.summary: Strategy established a $1.44 billion cash reserve and slashed profit targets as its stock fell below its bitcoin holdings' value.

metals.title: Precious Metals Rally to Record Highs
metals.summary: Gold and silver reached unprecedented highs amid a parabolic rally, showing strong correlation with momentum stocks and benefiting from AI manufacturing applications.

clearAll.description: This will permanently delete all items from your AI memory. This action cannot be undone.

onboarding.importDescription: Import conversations from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, and more. Your AI will remember everything across all your chats.

graph.title: Graph

migration.title: Migrate Memory
migration.description: Transfer your encrypted memories between environments with password protection.
migration.exportInfo: Your memories will be decrypted and re-encrypted with your chosen password for safe transfer. You'll need this password to import on the destination.
migration.exportSuccessDesc: Your password-protected backup is ready for migration
migration.legacyFileDesc: This file was created with the old export format. Please create a new password-protected export from the source environment.
migration.previewWarningDesc: Memories created here won't be available on Swiss BrAIn. Use 'Migrate Memory' to export before switching.

upload.title: Upload to Memory
upload.dragDropFiles: Drag & drop files here, or click to select

documents.title: Documents

documents.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete this item and all its chunks from your memory. This action cannot be undone.

voiceNotes.recordAtLeast: Please record for at least a second
voiceNotes.noSpeechDesc: Could not detect any speech in the recording
voiceNotes.deleteDesc: This will permanently delete the voice note and its transcript.

connectors.title: Memory Connectors
connectors.subtitle: Sync data from external sources
connectors.description: Choose which integrations sync to your AI Memory. Data is encrypted and stored locally.
connectors.signInToConnect: Please sign in to connect integrations
connectors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
connectors.encryptedNote: All synced data is encrypted with your vault password and stored locally.

search.title: Search Memory
search.subtitle: Find relevant content in your knowledge base

sync.title: Sync
sync.providerDesc: Choose where to backup your encrypted memory. Data is encrypted before upload.
sync.localOnlyDesc: Memory is stored locally on this device only.
sync.enableSyncHint: Enable sync in Sync Settings for backup.
sync.googleDriveDesc: Sync to your personal Google Drive
sync.s3Desc: Enterprise: Use your own S3 bucket
sync.e2eDesc: Your memory is encrypted with your vault password before upload. The sync provider only sees encrypted data and cannot read your content.

distill.title: Distill Insights
distill.description: AI extracts key points, topics, and action items from your conversations.
distill.createdInsights: Created {{count}} structured insights from your conversations
distill.analyzeDescription: Analyze your imported conversations to extract structured insights like key points, topics, action items, and decisions.

import.title: Import AI History
import.uploadDescription: Import conversations from any AI platform. We auto-detect the format.
import.ready: Your memories are ready to use
import.unlockFirst: Please unlock your vault first to import conversations
import.noConversations: No valid conversations found in file
import.dragDrop: Drag & drop your export file, or click to browse
import.claudeUploadDesc: Upload your conversations.json file from Claude export
import.claudeDragDrop: Drag & drop conversations.json, or click to browse
import.claudeExportHint: Export from Claude: Settings → Account → Export Data

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Workspaces for your documents
projects.customInstructionsPlaceholder: Specific instructions for queries in this project...
projects.createFirstProject: Create your first project to get started
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
projects.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All linked documents will be unlinked from this project.
projects.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filters
projects.addDocumentsDesc: Add documents from your memory to this project
projects.askQuestion: Ask a question about this project...
projects.briefMeDesc: Generate an audio briefing from project documents

projectQuery.title: Query Project
projectQuery.placeholder: Ask something about the documents in this project...

addDocs.title: Add Documents to Project
addDocs.description: Select documents from your memory to add to this project.

unlock.title: Unlock Your Vault
unlock.description: Enter your encryption password to access your secure messages

setup.title: Setup Vault
setup.subtitle: Create a password to protect your data
setup.passwordHint: This password encrypts all your data locally

helios.title: Health Assistant
helios.subtitle: Your AI-powered health companion
helios.welcome: Hello! I'm your health assistant. How can I help you today?
helios.inputPlaceholder: Describe your symptoms or ask a health question...
helios.disclaimer: This is not a substitute for professional medical advice. In case of emergency, call emergency services immediately.

chat.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

prescription.title: Prescription Request
prescription.disclaimer: A doctor will review and may approve, request more info, or schedule a video call.

questions.takenBefore: Have you taken this medication before?
questions.howOften: How often do you take it?
questions.havePrescription: Do you have a copy of your current prescription?
questions.doctorName: What is the name of your prescribing doctor?

emergency.title: Emergency Numbers
emergency.disclaimer: For immediate emergencies, call your local emergency services.
